vocabulary.example: The superhero's shield was made of an indestructible material.

vocabulary.definition: a subatomic particle with no electric charge
vocabulary.example: Neutrons are found in the nucleus of an atom along with protons.

vocabulary.definition: a point in space-time where gravitational forces cause matter to be infinitely compressed
vocabulary.example: The concept of a singularity at the center of a black hole is mind-boggling.
The ancient statue was pulverized into dust by the earthquake.

vocabulary.definition: a figure of speech in which a word or phrase is applied to an object or action to which it is not literally applicable
vocabulary.example: Her smile was a metaphor for sunshine, brightening up the room.

vocabulary.definition: a large-scale and violent event in the natural world
vocabulary.example: The earthquake caused by the tectonic plate movement was a cataclysm for the region.
